title: Liberty University welcomed coronavirus to campus last week, the New York Times reported. That's 'false,' university says.
description: After the New York Times reported that multiple Liberty students had gotten sick after returning to campus, the Virginia university pushed back.
content: Less than a week after welcoming back nearly students amid the nations coronavirus outbreak Liberty University again finds itself in the middle of a controversy After the New York Times reported Sunday that multiple Liberty students had gotten sick a chars
